subject: Urgent: Reset Your Account Password Immediately
body_snippet:
Dear user,

We've detected unusual activity on your account. To prevent any unauthorized access, you are required to reset your password immediately.

Please click the link below to reset your password:

http://secure-login-reset.tk/account/recovery

Failure to act within 24 hours will result in suspension of your account.

Thank you,  
IT Security Team  
secure-updates.com
phishing_warnings: Suspicious keywords detected: reset your password
url_analysis: http://secure-login-reset.tk/account/recovery — Suspicious TLD detected: .tk; Contains keyword: 'login'; Contains keyword: 'secure'; Contains keyword: 'account'
